string.value: After speaking with #b#p2081007##k, he said the dragon has not reached maturity. There must be something I can do to increase its' power...
Raul told me to gather #b25 #t4031482##k if I want to raise #q2321003#'s power. It's time to hunt! \n\n#i4031482##t4031482# #b#c4031482#/25#k
After I gave Raul #t4031482#, he awakened #q2321003#'s power. I can feel it radiating...magnificent!
You got the power of #q2321003#. Your dragon's power is still under-developed. Do you want to develop its power further?

If you want to give your dragon more power, get #t04031482#. Looking at your dragon's power...I can make it work with #b25 #t04031482##k. This process is know to be flawless so long as the proper materials are brought. I await your return.
You mean you don't want the power any more? It seems strange to come so far, only to turn back now...
Ah! You gathered 25#t04031482#. It seems you want to increase your dragon's power after all!
Good. Your dragon has grown in power. But still, #bthe power of your dragon is not fully developed yet.#k
You haven't got #b25#t04031482##k. It's impossible to make the power work with less than 25. When you have the needed materials, please return to me and I will increase your dragon's power.
